name: Sheltered Double Pack
description:
The original Sheltered and highly anticipated sequel Sheltered 2 join forces in this unforgiving survival management double pack.
Sheltered Sheltered is a deep and emotional survival management game. You take on the role of protecting four family members who, after a global apocalypse, have found their way to a deserted shelter. 

Sheltered 2 A brutal survival management simulator set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Keep your faction of survivors alive, maintain your shelter and scavenge the ravaged world for resources. Befriend and trade with the factions you meet or conquer them by force.
